title: Aurelion Sol sound bug
body:
Heya, first of all, i apologize if this has been stated before.

There's this weird, sorta bug, that happens when Aurelion Sol is ingame. I think this has been around since 2-3 patches, not sure exactly. Basically, when Aurelion Sol uses Q and manages to hit an enemy champion (or dunno, generally when it detonates to enemies, being minions or champs), all sounds near that spell become really, really low in volume (even quotes !). All enemies spells have lower sound, while ASol's W becomes soundless. It's 100 % reproducable, at least in my games.

Is this an issue that happens only to my game? If so, how can i fix that :P

replies.body:
Hey ff CoSmo, thanks for the report! 

This sounds familiar, so I don't think it's something that's just on your end. Lemme catch up with the Champion team and see what the status is for this issue. :)
Commenting to save this thread for future reference, and to ask if there is an update on the status of this bug at all?
A bit late from myself, but thank you for answering ! :D
I have the same problem and my friends
